entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41564
  • [9.0-preview.5] dotnet test fails on Windows when error is logged to the test output #41541
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET9 preview 6 sdk installed, create blazorwasm project failed with error "Could not resolve SDK "Microsoft.NET.Runtime.Emscripten.Python.${NetVersion}". Exactly one of the probing messages bel..." #41538

Closed

  • Introduce "bint" as a new keyword for BigInteger #38979
  • package table is not updating #41559
  • Source Build fails CI for SDK @ release/6.0.1xx #40320
  • -p:DebugSymbols=false does not disable generation of .pdb files #41364

PullRequests

Created

  • Trusted roots: 2024-06 CTL #41565
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Aspire 8.0 workload in the 9.0 SDK #41562
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • update sdk preview 5 #41560
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 9.0.100-preview.6.24312.1 #41558
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41553
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add --rid top level option #41540
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Create 0001-upgrade-jdk-version.patch #41563
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Respect DebugSymbols=false Fixes #41364 #41384
    Review for breaking changes, untriaged, breaking-change, Area-NetSDK, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add back a line that was lost in dotnet/installer migration #41537
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dispose HttpClient in WorkloadManifestUpdater #41489
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add missing Restore option for ArtifactsPath and tests #41532
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [Static Web Assets] Resolve tokens on the generated initializers module manifest #41533
    untriaged

Updated

  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Dispose HttpClient and Stream in AddPackageParser #41490
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41534
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • source-build: bundle NativeAOT libraries with the SDK. #41198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
